cause.description:
any of else bored of sir bono and his merry band of hypocrates trying to save the world? too lazy to care about the exstinction of the slow loris? enjoying the warmer summers and milder wilters? well help save global warming today by doing nothing, keep driving 4X4's, leaving the tv on, and wasting as much plastic as possible. how bad can global warming be? it could be saving us frome the ice age.
1. endanger as many creatures as possible, no one likes competition.
2. ban recycling, recyclings for loosers.
3. drive the biggest monster truck you can find, people will respect you for it.
cause.mission: burn the rainforest, use up natural resorces, dump toxic waste, you know, the usual.
cause.name: help globbal warming
